We show that the relative space efficiency of a PKR formalism is 4 Space Efficiency of Propositional Knowledge Representation Formalisms directly related to such classes .In particular , the ability of a PKR formalism to compactly represent sets of models / theorems is directly related to the class of the model / theorem hierarchy it belongs to .
